title: Process Prepayment for Stay
description: A customer wants to prepay for their entire hotel stay in advance to receive a discounted rate.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's reservation and confirm the total cost with the prepayment discount applied.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the booking and provides the final, discounted price.

tasks.description: Explain that the prepayment is non-refundable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the terms of the prepayment.

tasks.description: Process the full payment using the customer's credit card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully charges the card and marks the reservation as fully prepaid.
